trans-unit.source: Converts a control on the Web Forms page that can be validated with a validation control to a string containing the control's ID.
trans-unit.target: 將可驗證的 Web Form 網頁上的控制項，與驗證控制項轉換為字串，包含控制項的 id。

trans-unit.source: Not all controls can be validated with a validation control.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的控制項可以與驗證控制項進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: This class creates a collection of control IDs on the Web Forms page that can be associated with a validation control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別建立與驗證控制項相關聯的 Web Form 網頁上的控制項 Id 的集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used in a designer to display a list of controls on the Web Forms page that can be associated with a validation control.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合通常用在設計工具中顯示一份可以與驗證控制項相關聯的 Web Form 網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When creating your own validation control, you can enable the designer to display a list of controls that support validation controls.
trans-unit.target: 建立您自己的驗證控制項時，您可以啟用設計工具，以顯示支援驗證控制項的控制項的清單。

trans-unit.source: Simply add an attribute to the string property that represents the control to validate, as follows: ```vb# <TypeConverter(GetType(ValidatedControlConverter))> _ Public Property ControlToValidate() As String Get // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. End Get Set // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. End Set End Property ``` ```c# [TypeConverter(typeof(ValidatedControlConverter))] public string ControlToValidate { get { // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. } set { // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. } } ```
trans-unit.target: 只要將屬性加入字串屬性，代表控制項，來驗證，如下所示︰```vb# <TypeConverter(GetType(ValidatedControlConverter))> _ Public Property ControlToValidate() As String Get // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. End Get Set // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. End Set End Property ``` ```c# [TypeConverter(typeof(ValidatedControlConverter))] public string ControlToValidate { get { // Add code to get the ID of the control to validate. } set { // Add code to set the ID of the control to validate. } } ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified control should be added to the list of controls that can be validated.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的控制項是否應加入至可驗證的控制項的清單。

trans-unit.source: When the FilterControl method returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter> instance will add the ID of the control specified in the control parameter to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: FilterControl 方法傳回時`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter>執行個體將會加入的控制項參數中指定的控制項識別碼<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatedControlConverter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should be added to the list of controls that can be validated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項應加入的控制項可驗證; 清單否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
